properties.title: ADOT Collector logs
properties.query: SOURCE '__LOG_GROUP__' | fields @timestamp, @logStream, @message | filter @logStream like /adot/ | sort @timestamp desc | limit 50

properties.title: CloudWatch Agent logs
properties.query: SOURCE '__LOG_GROUP__' | fields @timestamp, @logStream, @message | filter @logStream like /cwagent/ | sort @timestamp desc | limit 50
